meaningMnemonic: If you are <radical>anti</radical> <radical>one sided</radical> paper you should bind them all up into an <kanji>edition</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The first <kanji>edition</kanji> you create is a fan fiction all about the adventures of <reading>Han</reading> (はん) Solo. You hated how short and one sided his story in Star Wars seemed to be, and trying to keep track of it all was really hard. But not anymore!
